@title ERC20Interface.
 * @notice Provides ERC20 token interface.
nodes.name: ERC20I

     * @return tokenName_ Name of the token.

     * @return tokenSymbol_ Symbol of the token.

     * @return tokenDecimals Decimals of the token.

nodes.documentation:
@title ERC20Interface.
 * @notice Provides ERC20 token interface.
nodes.name: ERC20I

nodes.documentation:
@notice External function to get the name of the token.
     * @return tokenName_ Name of the token.
nodes.name: name

nodes.documentation:
@notice External function to get the symbol of the token.
     * @return tokenSymbol_ Symbol of the token.
nodes.name: symbol

nodes.documentation:
@notice External function to get the decimals of the token.
     * @return tokenDecimals Decimals of the token.
nodes.name: decimals

nodes.documentation:
@notice External function to get the total supply of the tokens.
     * @return totalTokenSupply_ Total token supply.
nodes.name: totalSupply
balanceOf
allowance
transfer
transferFrom
approve

allowance(address,address).return: allowance_ Remaining allowance for the spender to spend from                   owner's account.

params._spender: Address authorized to spend from the function caller's                address.
params._value: Amount up to which spender is authorized to spend.

approve(address,uint256).return: bool `true` for a successful approval, `false` otherwise.

balanceOf(address).return: balance_ Account balance of the owner account.

params._to: Address to which tokens are transferred.
params._value: Amount of tokens to be transferred.

transfer(address,uint256).return: success_ `true` for a successful transfer, `false` otherwise.

params._from: Address from which tokens are transferred.
params._to: Address to which tokens are transferred.

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).return: success_ `true` for a successful transfer, `false` otherwise.

allowance(address,address).notice: External function to get the allowance.

approve(address,uint256).notice: External function to approve an account for transfer.

balanceOf(address).notice: Get the balance of an account.

decimals().notice: External function to get the decimals of the token.

name().notice: External function to get the name of the token.

symbol().notice: External function to get the symbol of the token.

totalSupply().notice: External function to get the total supply of the tokens.

transfer(address,uint256).notice: External function to transfer the token.
